about_the_game:
Bring Party Hard OST with you. This is the reimagined soundtrack that replaces the one in the original Party Hard release. We licensed the music without rights to sell initially, and that caused a ton of issues and copyright claims on YouTube. So we rewrote the whole OST and now it can be yours!
Tracklist:

01 Beat Dreams
02 I Said We Party Tonight
03 Wild Of Bass
04 I Am Trouble
05 Shine Bright
06 Heart Of The Beat
07 He Knows You're A Dancer
08 Lucky
09 Keep It Going
10 Golden Tomorrow
11 E-Motions
12 Wild Mind
detailed_description:
Bring Party Hard OST with you. This is the reimagined soundtrack that replaces the one in the original Party Hard release. We licensed the music without rights to sell initially, and that caused a ton of issues and copyright claims on YouTube. So we rewrote the whole OST and now it can be yours!
Tracklist:

01 Beat Dreams
02 I Said We Party Tonight
03 Wild Of Bass
04 I Am Trouble
05 Shine Bright
06 Heart Of The Beat
07 He Knows You're A Dancer
08 Lucky
09 Keep It Going
10 Golden Tomorrow
11 E-Motions
12 Wild Mind

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that plays music files
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: You don't need graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that plays audio
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Built in toaster
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Non-USB C

name: Party Hard Remastered OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything really
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Toaster
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that supports headphones

short_description: Get the Original Soundtrack for Party Hard
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Romanian, French, Ukrainian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
